'''''Friends, Travelers, Lend Me Your Ears...''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Stone Harbor's Nostalgia: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to finish listening to the tale of the Ring of Raining Blades in ''[[Cliffhanger]].''

==Trivia==
* The title of this achievement is a reference to the famous line "{{w|Friends, Romans, countrymen, lend me your ears}}" from the Shakespeare play {{w|Julius Caesar (play)|Julius Caesar}}.
